contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 11, 2011 D Dr Martin Trust Contest
Dr Martin Trust Contest 0 March, Solo and Own Choice Test Piece Contest (Separate Points)
dr-martin-trust-contest
Town Hall, Middlesbrough, North Yorkshire Best March: Exchange Communications Whitburn Band Best Solo: Tina Mortimer (cornet), Reg Vardy
Prize Money: 1. £4,000 2. £2,000 3. £1,000 4. £500
Best Solo and Best March items received an additional £250.
Rothwell withdrew after "an individual connected with the band had directly contacted adjudicator Kevin Wadsworth" prior to the contest. See http://www.4barsrest.com/news/detail.asp?id=13897
Aug. 19, 2011, 2:33 p.m. Feb. 18, 2012, 11:07 p.m.
1 Whitburn Band Ian Porthouse Music for Battle Creek
2 Reg Vardy Band Ray Farr Red Priest
3 Friary Brass Band Chris King Contest Music
4 Unite the Union (City of Sheffield) Derek Renshaw Contest Music
5 Yorkshire Imperial Brass Band David Nesbitt Variations on an Enigma
6 Felling Band Steve Malcolm Music for Battle Creek
7 Fishburn Band John Ward English Heritage
8 Pemberton Old Wigan DW Band Mark Bentham On the Shoulders of Giants
9 Drighlington Band Jim Davies Un Vie de Matelot (A Sailor's Life)
10 Milton Keynes Brass Paul Fensom High Peak
Withdrawn Rothwell Temperance Band David Roberts
